title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: goal Data Triangulation Stream 2 Dashboard Triangulate Nigeria Routine Immunization Vaccine Preventable Diseases Surveillance Data

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: Nigeria Routine Immunization (RI) & Vaccine Preventable Diseases Surveillance (VPDs) Data Triangulation Dashboard visualizes selected indicators across RI & VPDs programme. dashboard developed R Shiny technology integrated country‚Äôs DHIS2 national instance, Surveillance Outbreak Response Management Analysis System (SORMAS), Multi-Source Data Analytics Triangulation (MSDAT) Platform. dashboard provides access timely information required decision making national sub-national levels.

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: can install development version DataTriangulationStream2 GitHub :

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: First, dashboard built using R shiny hosted shinyapps.io servers Rstudio hosting services, app url used integrate 3 platforms using iframe. special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ‚Äôll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. case, don‚Äôt forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.

Determine the scale range of number y-axis ‚Äî plot_number_range
text: formula used (max_number > 100)  max_number+ (max_number/ 2) rule applies min_number towards negative side

text: formula used (max_rate  > 100)  max_rate + (max_rate/ 2) rule applies min_rate towards negative side

title: Run the Shiny Application ‚Äî run_app
text: Run Shiny Application

title: Run the Shiny Application ‚Äî run_app
code: run_app(onStart = NULL, options = list(), enableBookmarking = NULL, ...)

title: Run the Shiny Application ‚Äî run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See ?golem::get_golem_options details.
